entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 8:23 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:23 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
